de.hshl.obj.data

Class Mutable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.meta.Reflective.DataClass
      • de.hshl.obj.data.Mutable<T>

  • public final class Mutable<T>
extends Reflective.DataClass
    Can be used as a wrapper to replace immutable values inside lambda expressions, effectively making these immutable values mutable. The following code would not work because x must be final: 
    
      int x = 0;
      call(() -> { x++; })
    Using Mutable, the code will work: 
    
      final Mutable<Integer> x = new Mutable<>(0);
      call(() -> { x.setValue(5); });
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer
